articles.title: Laois village pub gets €90k grant for tourist suites

articles.title: Liverpool agree Florian Wirtz deal that could rise to British record £116m
articles.description: Fee for Bayer Leverkusen attacker is split between £100million guaranteed and bonuses of up to £16million, which could exceed record fee for Moisés Caicedo in 2023
articles.content:
Liverpool have agreed a deal with Bayer Leverkusen for Florian Wirtz that could set a new British transfer record of £116 million.

articles.title: Why did the Air India plane crash shortly after takeoff? Aviation experts weigh in
articles.description: A central question for investigators is why the aircraft failed to gain altitude.
articles.content:
The moments just after takeoff are often the most challenging in aviation – ones that pilots are rigorously trained to handle, air safety experts said on Friday (Jun 13), a day after an Air India crash.
